ModMetaData.name: Pawn Badge Fan Fork
ModMetaData.author: Updated by Saucy_Pigeon
ModMetaData.description:
The fan fork of the mod "Pawn Badge" originally by Rangel Reale which allows adding up to two informative badges to the colonist bar.
Any badge mods made for the original mod will be compatible with this mod.
Can be safely added and removed from save games.
Requires Hugslib.
Credits: - Rangel Reale, the original author of the mod. - LeninsCat, for fixing the manifest error message and providing excellent updated textures.
